Translations.Text: Nos inspired vos prout nos inspired Noah prophets eum. Nos inspired Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs Jesus Job Jonah Aaron Solomon. Nos dedit David Psalms
Messengers nos told vos messengers nos nunquam told vos de. Deus spoke to Moses directly
Messengers deliver bonus news alias prout warnings. Sic people non habet excuse when they face DEUS post totus these messengers advenit them. DEUS est Almighty Wise
Deus bears testis de quod He revealed vos; He revealed it His knowledge! angels bear testis alias DEUS suffices prout testis
Surely those disbelieve repel via DEUS habet strayed far astray
Those disbelieve transgress DEUS testimentum non forgive them nor testimentum He guide them in any via
Via to Hell, wherein they abide forever Hoc est easy DEUS perfecit
O people messenger advenit vos truth ex tuus Dominus! Ergo vos believe tuus suus bonus Vos disbelieve tunc DEUS belongs everything caelum terra. DEUS est Omniscient Wise

O people scripture non transgress limits tuus religionis non dictus DEUS absque truth! Messiah Jesus filius Mary est messenger DEUS His word He habet sent to Mary revelation Eum. Ergo vos believe in DEUS His messengers. Vos non dictus Trinity. Vos refrain hoc tuus suus bonus DEUS est UNUS UNUS DEUS. He glorified He est much too glorious habet filius! To Eum belongs everything caelum everything on terra! DEUS suffices DOMINUS AC Magister
Messiah nunquam disdain ex est servus DEUS nor would closest angels. Those qui disdain ex worshipping Eum est too arrogant submit He summon them totus ante Eum

Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita He fully recompense them shower them His gratia! Prout pro those disdain turn arrogant He commit them painful retribution! They non invenit dominus DEUS nor savior
O people proof advenit vos tuus Dominus; nos sent vos profound beacon
Those believe in DEUS habuit fast Eum He admit them mercy Eum gratia guide them Eum in straight path

They consult vos; dictus DEUS advises vos single person. Unus abiit non sinister infans he habet soror she gets semi inheritance! she abiit primas he inherits eam she non sinister infans. ibi est 2 soror they get two-thirds inheritance. siblings est vir femina vir gets twice share femina. DEUS sic clarifies vos lest vos iit astray! DEUS est fully aware de TOTUS things
